name: oblivion
content:
oblivion noun [U]
(NO MEMORY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the state of being completely forgotten: He was another minor poet who was consigned to oblivion. These toys will be around for a year or two, then fade/slide/sink into oblivion.
the state of being completely destroyed: The planes bombed the city into oblivion.
